header_text: Updated DevTV Introduction to Revit Programming
chunk_text:
Updated DevTV Introduction to Revit Programming

The Revit Developer Center proudly presents an updated version of the DevTV Introduction to Revit Programming for Revit 2010, which is now available in both English and Portuguese:

  • English: View online | Download.
  • Portuguese: View online | Download.

Oh dear, Saikat just pointed out that the online viewing links apparently do not work here, they only work when selected on the Revit Developer Center page. Sorry about that.

The original version was created based on Revit 2008, and we reused that version for our Revit 2009 getting started material as well.

Many thanks to Augusto Gon√ßalves of Autodesk Brazil for creating the updated version for Revit 2010!
